pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Network Visualizations in R and 'shiny' // Create Interactive Graph (Network) Visualizations. 'shinyCyJS' can be used in 'Shiny' apps or viewed from 'Rstudio' Viewer. 'shinyCyJS' includes API to build Graph model like node or edge with customized attributes for R. 'shinyCyJS' is built with 'cytoscape.js' and 'htmlwidgets' R package.
